name: Sockventure: Prologue (itch)
description:
In Sockventure you play as a superhero Supersock trying to find all the missing socks inside the cursed washing machine. Stunning colorful graphics, hand-crafted levels, tight controls and fun ever-changing gameplay.

FEATURES

  • 50+ Levels - Over 50 handcrafted Levels.
  • Special Skills - Get new Skills during the game. Wall jumping, double jumping and dashing.
  • Challenges - Multiple Challenges to beat.
  • Socks - Find hidden Socks and use them as your Outfit.
  • Coins - Find and collect all the coins to unlock Dark World.
  • Dark World - The Dark World offers new more challenging Levels to test your skills in.
  • (ONLY ON STEAM) Leaderboards - Try to get to the top of global and friends leaderboards.

NIGHTHOUSE GAMES

We are very small indie team from Tampere, Finland. You can read more about us from here www.nighthousegames.com. This is our first game and release! We have been making this over 2 years now and we are very excited to show you guys what this game is about. Full game Sockventure  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1222340/Sockventure/ will be out by Q1 2021. Play our prologue, leave a review and wishlist it on Steam! It means everything to us! Thanks for reading.

You can also play it on steam with global/friends leaderboards and achievements: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1294300/Sockventure_Prologue/
